description: When attempting to execute a script, there is a compile/runtime error due to an incorrect format for the os.path.join command. The script is unable to process the command correctly, resulting in an error.
code:
import os

def main(): 
    path1 = "C:/Users/user/Documents"
    path2 = "MyFiles"
    path3 = "Data"
    path4 = "TextFiles"
    
    # Incorrect format of os
